item.title: Fubo Is Launching a ‘Skinny’ TV Sports Bundle, to Cost $56 Monthly, Which Includes ESPN Unlimited
item.description: When FuboTV first launched in 2015, it was aimed at soccer fans — with a slim bundle of soccer-focused live channels that cost $7 per month. But within a few years, Fubo had expanded the channel

item.title: ESPN Unlimited Debuts with a Limited-Time Bundle Deal for Disney Fans and TV Lovers
item.description: The sports network’s first on-demand streaming platform is available with Disney+ and Hulu starting at only $29.99 per month.
